title: Major Appliances at Lowe's: Up to 35% off + free shipping
text: New [more](#) Save on washers, dryers, ranges, refrigerators, and more, including the pictured Frigidaire Front Control 24" Built-In Dishwasher for $349 ($210 off). Shop Now at Lowe's [â†‘ less](#) - Expires 1/3/2024 Published 15 min ago - Popularity: 0/5 [more](#) Save on major appliances from brands like LG, Samsung, and GE by opting for an open-box model. Shop Now at Best Buy [more](#) Clip the 50% off on page coupon and apply code "FLG9NEAD" to save $290. Buy Now at Amazon - 33Kpa powerful suction - 1.3L dust cup capacity - 5-stage filtration system [more](#) That's a $172 low right now. Buy Now at Home Depot [more](#) A wide range of deals are on offer, including up to $600 off Galaxy Book3 laptops, up to $1,200 off Bespoke refrigerators, and up to $1,000 instant trade-in credit on select Galaxy phones. Shop Now at Samsung [more](#) There are savings of as much as 75% off available here. Plus, select items are included in further promotional discounts; for example, some tools come with free batteries or other free items (eligible items are marked on the product pages). https://www.dealnews.com/lw/click.html?20,2,21471011 - Shipping adds $5.99, although orders of $45 or more ship free. Select items may be available for store pickup.
